description: The installation of a 20 metre high monopole that accommodates six No. multi-band antennas within a GRP shroud.  There will also be three No. radio equipment cabinets and one No. electrical metre cabinet located next to the pole and ancillary development thereto.
site_name: Electricity Sub Station At Railway Land Station Road And Junction Road Junction
decision_conditions:
To assist applicants the Local Planning Authority has produced policies and written guidance, all of which is available on the Councilâ€™s website.
